API Reference¶

Spatial plots¶

pointplot(df[, projection, hue, …])

A scatter plot, where data value(s) are represented as a coordinate point on a map.

polyplot(df[, projection, extent, figsize, …])

Polygons on a map.

cartogram(df[, projection, scale, limits, …])

Self-scaling area plot.

choropleth(df[, projection, hue, scheme, k, …])

A well-known area plot.

aggplot(df[, projection, hue, by, geometry, …])

Self-aggregating quadtree plot.

kdeplot(df[, projection, extent, figsize, …])

Spatial kernel density estimate plot.

sankey(*args[, projection, start, end, …])

Spatial Sankey or flow map.

voronoi(df[, projection, edgecolor, clip, …])

Geospatial Voronoi diagram.
